name: Angry Uncle Frank
description:
A game about news - not about labels like fake or not - but about media literacy. What are the processes you and I should go through when reading anything that calls itself news. The play is an ordinary Joe (Jack in this case) who gets his information from his favourite unemployed uncle Frank. But is everything Frank says true? The player as Jack gets media articles from friends and they force him to figure out what Jack can trust.

Team:
